General.Name: Yangarra Resources Ltd
General.Description: Yangarra Resources Ltd., a junior oil and gas company, engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas properties in Western Canada. The company focuses on the Cardium in Central Alberta. It also focuses on the Western Canadian Sedimentary basin. The company is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 715-5th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 2X6

1.Name: Mr. Gurdeep S. Gill C.F.A., CFA
